summary: Water quality is stable but TDS is slightly elevated. Monitor closely.

insights.recommendation: Maintain pH between 6.5 and 7.5 for optimal tilapia and plant health.
Consider diluting with fresh water if TDS exceeds 400 ppm.
Ideal temperature for tilapia is 26-30°C; maintain current temperature.

extended_notes:
Last 7 days overview:
• pH avg/min/max: 7.059 / 7.025 / 7.08 (trend: up)
• TDS avg/min/max: 307.237 / 295.1 / 347.6 ppm (trend: down)
• Temp avg/min/max: 28.322 / 27.25 / 29.94 °C (trend: up)

Actions (if needed):
• pH: keep ~6.6–7.2; calibrate probe with 7.00/4.01; adjust slowly.
• TDS: seedlings ~200–500 ppm; higher OK for mature plants; water-change to reduce.
• Temp: hold in target band for your fish/plants; heater/chiller/aeration as needed.
